title: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021 - Source path incorrect in declare warning on binary files [java|aj]. To reproduce the issue, please run the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. directory. It is important to note that these tests may produce false positives due to the lack of filename checking in the harness verification of messages. (In AJDT, if the filename doesn't make sense, it may be omitted.)
OB: No observed behavior is mentioned in the bug report.
EB: In declare warning messages while targeting .class files from injars, the source path is displayed incorrectly as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.'
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Run the code in tests/new/binaryWarnings/.. directory. 2. Observe the declare warning messages while targeting .class files from injars, where the source path is displayed as 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.'
